name: Salvage
summary: Inorganic material from wrecks, ruins, and corpses.
description: Salvage includes torn canvas, metal shards, curious artefacts, and poorly-made weaponry, acquired mainly through scavenging or looting.
uses: Attack foes without a dedicated weapon

tags.name: Sturdy
tags.description: Clears an extra mark when used to repair damage to an aspect track or an injury.

tags.name: Ornate
tags.description: Has far more worth than usual.

tags.name: Broken
tags.description: Almost useless for its intended purpose.

name: Scratch
summary: Small odds and ends used for minor barter.
description: Scratch is made up of leftover bits like fruit seeds, amber fragments, and insect wings, used to cover basic amenities without tracking resources.
uses: Pay for low-cost items or services

name: Specimens
description: Specimens include meats, organs, chitinous shells, spices, fruits, fungus, or bones, useful for various crafting and healing purposes.
uses: Attack foes without a dedicated weapon

tags.name: Pure/Medicinal
tags.description: Clears an extra mark when used to heal damage to an aspect track or an injury.

tags.name: Heirloom
tags.description: Has far more worth than usual.

tags.name: Rotten
tags.description: Makes you sick if you eat it.

name: Whispers
summary: Wild secrets with the power to change the narrative.
description: Whispers are parasitic words that exist in minds and are lost when spoken, capable of revealing secrets or altering reality.
uses: Twist the narrative in your favor
Force a change with high-impact twists

tags.name: Echoing
tags.description: Can be used twice before fading.

tags.name: Hungry
tags.description: Removes an element of the world rather than adding one.

name: Charts
description: Charts record locations, hazards, and routes, essential for planning journeys and discovering new places.

tags.name: Detailed
tags.description: Shows far more information than normal.

name: Cargo
summary: Large or abundant resources, treated differently.
description: Cargo includes resources too large or too plentiful to carry, recorded on the ship sheet and used for barter or repairs.
uses: Repair structural damage to the ship

tags.name: Time-Sensitive
tags.description: Will go off and lose value before too long.

tags.name: Dangerous/Ornery
tags.description: Poses a risk to crew or is difficult to handle.
